column5: Anyone has expereince on using Digital Trollmaster control? I have one installed on my boat, but dont know if it's in function.  Last time I was on Simcoe. Seems it couldn't change speed no matter I turn into maximum or minimum.
I use a TrollMaster Pro 2, works great.   Are you making sure the servo inside the motor is actually working?
used one for 3 seasons now awesome product great service and tech support too  Dan
